about_the_game:
This is the second in the "90s Retro Sounds" series released in 2021!
It contains a total of 10 tracks created with a 90s RPG touch!
Through sampling from unique sound resources and deliberately limiting the number of channels played simultaneously, this package will color your creations with the atmosphere of and old-fashioned RPG!

This set contains mainly tracks intended for event scenes and emotional dialogues.

We especially recommend this set for those who like "nostalgic songs with no bleeping sounds" or a "familiar, nostalgic tunes” take in their games!

■Included music（ogg、m4a）
1.I like you that way. (theme of joy)
2.furiously(theme of anger)
3.It's the last time. (theme of sadness)
4.By the time that bell rings(theme of escape)
5.My favorite flower(theme of nostalgia)
6.be lost in the dark(theme of alleged)
7.tradition (theme of narrative)
8.Colleagues (theme of relief)
9.where are you? (theme of hailing)
10.With determination in my heart (theme of fate)


・This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
・OK to be used in Commercial projects made in RPG Maker
・Rights must be indicated when using assets.
・You may modify some of the assets (but not redistribute them) for your own game use only.
・All copyrights, neighboring rights, and all other rights to this material belong to the creator or a third party authorized by the creator.

This is the second in the "90s Retro Sounds" series released in 2021!
It contains a total of 10 tracks created with a 90s RPG touch!
Through sampling from unique sound resources and deliberately limiting the number of channels played simultaneously, this package will color your creations with the atmosphere of and old-fashioned RPG!

This set contains mainly tracks intended for event scenes and emotional dialogues.

We especially recommend this set for those who like "nostalgic songs with no bleeping sounds" or a "familiar, nostalgic tunes” take in their games!

■Included music（ogg、m4a）

6.be lost in the dark(theme of alleged)
7.tradition (theme of narrative)
8.Colleagues (theme of relief)

・This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
